668858720221bbe5f306b381: Спрятать Wi-Fi камеру в углу комнаты
668858720221bbe5f306b37d description: Итак, думаю, теперь мы знаем, где мой человек. До нас дошли кое-какие сведения, пока ты гулял. Он спрятался в операционной на станции, найди его. И сдаётся мне, что неплохо бы взять с собой камеру и спрятать её там. Для прикрытия, так сказать, да и небезопасно там.
668858720221bbe5f306b37d startedMessageT: Надеюсь, всё пройдёт как по маслу, мы и так потратили кучу времени на поиски!
668858720221bbe5f306b37d successMessaget: Я... Поверить не могу... Он мёртв? Ты установил камеру, чтобы узнать хотя бы, кто это сделал?!
668858720221bbe5f306b388 description: Камера, которую ты спрятал, всё же пригодилась. Санитар. Это он убил моего парня. Сделаем так: можешь отпустить его и ликвидировать сброд, который с ним таскается, либо завалить его самого, а остальные пусть проваливают на все четыре стороны. Решать тебе - я собираюсь почтить память своего погибшего друга.
668858720221bbe5f306b388 startedMessageT: Решай сам, какой будет расплата. Дай мне знать, когда закончишь.
668858720221bbe5f306b388 successMessaget: Решил убрать Санитара, да? Оно и к лучшему, наверное. Мне без разницы, моего парня это не вернёт. Просто очередное кровопролитие.
668858720221bbe5f306b388 failMessagetext: Решил отпустить Санитара, да? Тоже неплохо. Возможно, кому-то пользы от него больше, чем вреда. Вот только про себя я такого сказать не могу... нас с тем парнем многое связывало.

668858720221bbe5f306b3a6: Передать найденную в рейде папку с разведданными
668858720221bbe5f306b3a4 description: Одному из моих ребят поступил анонимный звонок. Неизвестный сообщил, что у него есть информация о парне, которого мы пытаемся найти. Проблема в том, что этот придурок не сказал, где именно он оставил папку с данными. Отправляйся в путь и постарайся что-нибудь нарыть.
668858720221bbe5f306b3a4 startedMessageT: Ну и чего ты ждёшь? Иди искать эту чёртову папку!
668858720221bbe5f306b3a4 successMessaget: Мы всё изучим и сообщим, если что обнаружится. Спасибо тебе, рискованное было мероприятие, надеюсь, рисковал ты не зря.
668858720221bbe5f306b3b0 description: Ничего такого в той папке не было, но там упоминается пара комнат в общагах возле таможни. Проверь их, может, обнаружишь что-нибудь необычное. Особых надежд я не питаю, но вдруг нам повезёт.
668858720221bbe5f306b3b0 successMessaget: Стоило догадаться, что это тупик, нас просто развели... чёрт! Я дам тебе знать, если наткнусь на новую зацепку. Спасибо, что рискнул собой ради этого. Знаю, там любит зависать Решала со своими ребятами, мало ли что могло случиться.
668858720221bbe5f306b3d5: Убить ЧВК выстрелом в голову днём на Заводе
668858720221bbe5f306b3d9: Убить ЧВК выстрелом в голову ночью на Заводе
668858720221bbe5f306b3d1 description: Говорят, идея с тем "анонимным звонком" принадлежала одной из банд, которые крутятся вокруг Таркова. Раз так, надо дать им понять, что с нами шутить не стоит. Их ребят в последнее время частенько видели на заводе. Снеси-ка пару-тройку дурных голов.
668858720221bbe5f306b3d1 successMessaget: Это будет им небольшим уроком. Попытаются провернуть такое ещё раз, убью их всех... твоими руками, конечно. Я-то на "пенсии".
668858720221bbe5f306b3e7: Убить ЧВК выстрелом в голову с расстояния менее 25 метров
668858720221bbe5f306b3e4 description: Урока, который ты им преподал, оказалось недостаточно. Один из моих ребят вернулся из рейда довольно помятый, говорит, они устроили ему "тёплую" встречу, а потом рассосались по окрестностям города. Трусы. Что ж, сами напросились. Ищи их где угодно и каждому найденному уроду отстрели башку. Только стреляй в упор, я хочу, чтобы они видели твои глаза перед смертью. Десятка трупов, думаю, с них хватит, чтоб усвоить материал.
668858720221bbe5f306b3e4 successMessaget: Главарь той банды вышел с нами на связь, хочет загладить вину. Я дам тебе знать, когда назначу место встречи. Отправишься туда и прикончишь его. Я уже сыт по горло!
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 description: Выяснилось, что всё это время мы охотились не на тех ребят, а этот "главарь банды" - не кто иной, как Тагилла. Остальные банды сообщили, что готовы "простить" нас, если мы его завалим. Думаю, так и стоит поступить, но сначала хотелось бы его припугнуть...
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 successMessaget: Ха-ха! Это ещё только цветочки. Передохни немного и приступим ко второму раунду.
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 failMessageText: Ты убил Тагиллу! Придётся попробовать ещё разок. Свято место пусто не бывает - кто-нибудь быстро напялит на себя его личину.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 description: Получил весточку от Тагиллы, он чертовски зол на нас. Собрал нечисть со всей округи, завод теперь просто кишит дикими. Надо бы там прибраться, прежде чем идти за головой этого урода. Забавно будет довести его до бешенства перед смертью.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 startedMessageT: Убивай диких по максимуму, завод надо зачистить. Оставим Тагиллу наедине с самим собой, чтобы успел немного подумать о своём поведении.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 successMessaget: Во, теперь он в бешенстве. Думаю пора заканчивать с этим, отличная работа.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 failMessageText: Ты убил Тагиллу! Придётся попробовать ещё разок. Свято место пусто не бывает - кто-нибудь быстро напялит на себя его личину.
668858720221bbe5f306b414 description: Думаю, мы довели клиента до кондиции, даже не припомню, чтобы кто-нибудь так психовал. Отправляйся на завод и размажь его мозги по всему цеху. И прихвати с собой его бейсболку, сойдёт в качестве доказательства. Надеюсь, остальные банды это устроит... всё-таки ты немало их ребят положил.
668858720221bbe5f306b414 startedMessageT: Тагилла - клиент непростой, возьми вот это на всякий случай.
668858720221bbe5f306b414 successMessaget: Какое-то время завод будет "чистым", пока не появится очередной подражатель. Надеюсь, новый босс окажется не таким брутальным, как Тагилла.

Воды и еды у нас достаточно, но парни устали, и немного сладкого сейчас им явно бы не помешало. Сможешь раздобыть немного?
668858720221bbe5f306b423 startedMessageT: Можешь пошариться по магазинам, либо, как вариант, по карманам у местных.
668858720221bbe5f306b423 successMessaget: Вот спасибо! Бери что-нибудь из наших излишков. Ту же воду, например, чтобы от жажды в рейде не загнуться.

Обычно мы добываем её в рейдах, иногда местные с собой бутылку-другую таскают. Загляни ещё в торговый центр, там и диких полно, и на втором этаже едальни всякие. Даже если дикари их и обчистили, то, наверное, не будут против избавиться от лишней ноши.
668858720221bbe5f306b42e startedMessageT: Идём сегодня по магазинам! Чёрт, терпеть не могу эту фразу, но сейчас она более чем уместна.
668858720221bbe5f306b42e successMessaget: Спасибо за выпивку, я тут приберёг пару бутылок отличного пойла для подобного случая, держи.

668858720221bbe5f306b447 description: В общем, такое дело. Видишь тех ребят? У них спор по поводу одного пари. Идиотское пари, но кое-кто погиб из-за него. Это их подкосило, и мне нужно привести их боевой дух в порядок. Давай поднимем ставку и покажем им, как это делается. Короче, тебе надо наведаться в каждую локацию и выжить там, не используя никакой медицины. Если справишься, устрою тебе персональную тренировочную сессию в награду.
668858720221bbe5f306b447 successMessaget: Ха-ха! Поверить не могу, что ты сделал это! Сейчас ребят позову, уверен, они с удовольствием выслушают историю твоих похождений!
668858720221bbe5f306b480 description: Ребята получили ОГРОМНЫЙ заряд бодрости от твоей прогулки по Таркову. Они даже поспорили, что ты не сможешь ликвидировать всех местных боссов. Если сделаешь это, проведём второй сеанс персональной тренировки. Да и вообще, после такого подвига они горы свернуть смогут, наверное. Удачи и будь осторожен!
668858720221bbe5f306b480 successMessaget: Я... Я поверить не могу, что тебе удалось это сделать. Отдыхай пока, если парни придумают ещё что-нибудь, то обязательно дам знать.
668858720221bbe5f306b4cd: Уничтожить все цели, не умерев и не используя броню
668858720221bbe5f306b4a9 description: Что ж, вот и новая ставка. Ребята решили, что до этого условия были слишком простыми. Просят теперь убить всех местных боссов без брони. Фантазии им явно не хватает, вот что я скажу.
668858720221bbe5f306b4a9 successMessaget: Ну ты крут, конечно, лично я бы на твоём месте и пытаться не стал. Если ребята ещё что-нибудь придумают, я обязательно дам тебе знать.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 description: Я раскритиковал ребят за их жалкие попытки придумать условия пари, никакой фантазии, сплошной самоповтор. Они поднапряглись и родили-таки новую идею. Уверен, тебе понравится.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 startedMessageT: Эта так называемая Погоня на глаза не так уж часто попадается. Как увидишь, сразу стреляй.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 successMessaget: Непросто было, но ты справился. Ребята будут гордиться тобой. Я сообщу, если они придумают что-нибудь новенькое!
668858720221bbe5f306b4e4 description: Есть лишние деньги? А у меня - лишнее место в схроне. Плати, и я поделюсь им с тобой.

668858720221bbe5f306b4e8 startedMessageT: Давай деньги - и без лишних слов!

668858720221bbe5f306b4ed startedMessageT: Давай деньги - и без лишних слов!
668858720221bbe5f306b4f2 description: Серьёзно? Ещё больше? Понял. Но и заплатить побольше придётся.

668858720221bbe5f306b4f7 description: Ну ты даёшь, конечно. Да, место ещё есть, но и мой схрон не резиновый. Больше места - больше денег.

668858720221bbe5f306b510 startedMessageT: Давай деньги - и без лишних слов!
668858720221bbe5f306b517 description: Ладно, хватит. Вот ещё один махонький уголок, и он же последний, которым я могу поделиться. У тебя и так уже барахла больше, чем у меня!

668858720221bbe5f306b51f: Выбрать, с кем работать: Аполлон или Максимус
668858720221bbe5f306b51e description: Okay, you're making this difficult for me now. I'm friends with both Apollo and Maximus. They're not happy with you, and I'm not happy with you forcing me into this position. You should have been more discrete when completing your tasks and we wouldn't have gotten to this point. They wouldn't have found out that you're working for the other one. You'll need to pay me so I can split the cash between them in order to recover some goodwill with them. At this point though, it's up to you for who you want to continue working with. They're both great but they aren't friends.
668858720221bbe5f306b51e startedMessageT: Let me know when you've decided by handing over the cash
668858720221bbe5f306b51e successMessaget: I'll give you one task for each of them. Whichever you choose to take will be the one you will work with.

668858720221bbe5f306b524 description: An old friend reached out to me, he heard you took on the big boss man himself, Tagilla. We thought you might be a good fit for a couple tasks he has lined up without any takers so far. First one on the list is to go track down that drug lab that popped up around the lighthouse. I'm not sure exactly where it is, but seeing as you've been there a few times - you might know where it is. Once you've found it, gather up some of the stims they've been making and hand them over for testing.
668858720221bbe5f306b524 startedMessageT: Some of these stims might be a bit rare to find, so take your time. He's in no rush.
668858720221bbe5f306b524 successMessaget: Thanks boss, I'll let him know you've got the goods. Already have a second task lined up for you!

668858720221bbe5f306b53b: Survive and extract from your current location
668858720221bbe5f306b534 description: That friend of mine, we call him Apollo - he's testing the stims you found but while he can do that in the lab with those..unfortunately this stim can't be tested as easily. We'll need you to risk it for the biscuit and shoot this thing into your arms and see how it makes you feel.
668858720221bbe5f306b534 startedMessageT: If it makes you feel it, you might need more than one.
668858720221bbe5f306b534 successMessaget: How much of that do you actually remember? I'll let you know when he's got that next task lined up.
668858720221bbe5f306b545: Explore EMERCOM Medical Care unit for potential surveillance spots
668858720221bbe5f306b548: Explore Techlight for potential surveillance spots
668858720221bbe5f306b54b: Find out how to turn on the power
668858720221bbe5f306b54f: Survive and extract from the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b542 description: I need you to find a dead drop location for us to utilize with Apollo. Those results you got from raging gave him some much needed insight into the creation of these new drugs. Find us a spot at the mall to transfer goods and get the hell out of there safely.
668858720221bbe5f306b542 startedMessageT: This is probably the easiest task you've ever had.
668858720221bbe5f306b542 successMessaget: Alright, when I pick which one we're going with, I'll let you know.
668858720221bbe5f306b55c: Flip on the power at the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b55e: Place M.U.L.E at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b55f: Place AHF1-M at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b560: Place Trimadol at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b561: Place P22 at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b559 description: Are you ready for OPERATION: Squirrel Nuts? You like the name? ... It wasn't my idea, OK? We've decided to make the dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage. Hopefully being a hard to access room will make this drop a bit safer. You're going to need to go flip on the power, place a camera just outside Techlight overlooking the room, and then stash the stims inside.
668858720221bbe5f306b559 successMessaget: Apollo should be on their way now, hopefully this goes smoothly.
668858720221bbe5f306b571: Handover found in raid lower half-masks
668858720221bbe5f306b56c description: Apollo reported to me that those stims were missing from the dead drop. Why does nothing go to plan on the first try? It's like a damn action movie. We reviewed the footage from the camera and it looks like a local body broke into the room shortly after you left and nicked the goods. I'm trying to prevent Apollo from ripping your head off so you better make amends. Go take out some of the locals in the mall and try to recover the goods. Bring back some of their masks as proof, they tend to wear them to hide their identities.
668858720221bbe5f306b56c startedMessageT: Apollo is pissed, you better make it snappy.
668858720221bbe5f306b56c successMessaget: Well done, but Apollo is still pissed at you, you're going to have to get back in their good graces.
668858720221bbe5f306b578 description: I think I've got an idea to keep the jobs flowing from Apollo. The dead drop went wrong, and I'm not blaming you - but Apollo is, they really needed those stims for their research. You're going to have to find more of them, and they need to be in pristine condition. If you can get them and hand them over to me I'll sort out the details to get them over to Apollo.
668858720221bbe5f306b578 successMessaget: I've sent a courier to get the goods over to Apollo, I'll let you know if he comes back in a better mood.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 description: Bad news bears...Not only is Apollo still upset at that job with the dead drop, while you were on your way to redeeming yourself for further jobs, they got news that you're also working with Maximus. Apollo is very pissed about it but is willing to let take one more task...for now. You need to acquire the census from the streets for them.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 startedMessageT: Get the census for Apollo, I have no idea what they're looking for in it but you better get it quick.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 successMessaget: I'll courier this over to them. I'll let you know when I have any more information
668858720221bbe5f306b58f: Find and access the testing room at the Laboratory
668858720221bbe5f306b590: Handover any combination of found in raid P22, L1, SJ1, SJ12, or 3-(b-TG) injectors
668858720221bbe5f306b58c description: APOLLO: I'm glad you've decided to work with me. Fuck that Maximus. They broke all my shit when they moved out and split off to form their own crew. I'm in need of some more stims for testing, a wide range should do. The best place to get them is to venture into the Laboratory and gain access to the locked testing room. I believe you'll need to find a keycard marked all black to get access. I'll need a variety of stims - P22, L1, SJ1, SJ12, or 3-(b-TG) injectors should do the trick. In the future I'll relay tasks through Scorpion instead of showing up here to talk to you personally.
668858720221bbe5f306b58c startedMessageT: The testing room isn't easy to gain access to, but it's worth it for all the medical supplies locked behind those doors.
668858720221bbe5f306b58c successMessaget: I'll get to testing these right away, I'll have a new task for you soon. Again - thank you for working with me.
668858720221bbe5f306b599: Handover found in raid Electronic Components
668858720221bbe5f306b59a: Handover found in raid COFDM Wireless Signal Transmitters
668858720221bbe5f306b598 description: News of your success defeating Tagilla has made it through my crew. Someone by the name of Maximus has reached out asking if you'd like to work with him. To get started, you'll have find some electronics for me to build a radio and amplifier.
668858720221bbe5f306b598 startedMessageT: I need all of the parts, and in pristine condition for me to build the radio and amplifier.
668858720221bbe5f306b598 successMessaget: Time to go install the radio!
668858720221bbe5f306b5a3: Go to the tower at the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b5a4: Place Far-forward GPS Signal Amplifier as high as you can
668858720221bbe5f306b5a5: Place Radio Repeater as high as you can
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 description: Now that I've got the parts, I've made these for you. You'll have to go set up the radio and amplifier at the mall. Find the highest point you can and install them. He'll relay through that to speak with me.
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 startedMessageT: Remember, it's got to be the highest point you can find.
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 successMessaget: As soon as you got those installed, I made contact and he's already got plans for you.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b4: Place Gas Analyzer at the source
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac description: It appears that Maximus is investigating the area around the laboratory, he thinks that there's something in there causing the locals in that area to be stronger, faster, and more badass than normal. You'll need to venture in, take out some of the locals, find any sources of contamination and place a gas analyzer if you find the area.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac startedMessageT: The laboratory is a dangerous place, make sure to bring extra medical supplies and heavy armour. Anything you lose there is lost for good.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac successMessaget: Whew, I bet that was a tough one. He's going to gather the data from that analyzer.
668858720221bbe5f306b5be: Leg meta Raiders while experiencing Pain at The Lab
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 description: The data is back from that gas analyzer you installed. Maximus thinks the fumes are making the locals stronger in every way, including how healthy they seem to be. It's a medical marvel. He's asked for you to test their resilience - If you go into the laboratory while in pain, they should swarm you. After you're good and surrounded, aim for their legs and cripple them. Might want to bring flesh rounds instead of standard armour penetrating rounds.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 startedMessageT: Remember, it's a tough place. Bring medical supplies and heavy armour. Protect yourself.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 successMessaget: It does sure seem like those guys are tougher than normal. I don't know what this means for us if they start venturing out - but I don't want to find out.
668858720221bbe5f306b5c3 description: We know the gangs that hang around in the laboratory are weirdly stronger than the rest of the locals..but we've heard of a group that call themselves the 'Goon Squad' - it's a fucking stupid name but that's what they picked. These guys seem tough. Too tough. They tend to roam in a pack together and aren't usually spotted in the same place for long. See if you can take them on, please do try to gather some data on their combat strategies and general health. It would help Maximus greatly.
668858720221bbe5f306b5c3 startedMessageT: The 'Good Squad' tends to be a bit telepathic in their movements together, I wonder if they are brothers?
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 description: That so-called 'Goon Squad' seemed way tougher than they should have been...is this all connected? While Maximus reviews your data, he's heard of yet another group. They don't have a name, but we know they travel at night. If you find yourself alone at night, and travelling through the tall grass and trees you may just hear their whispers. Don't get too close to them - we've heard they have really mastered their Melee Proficiency, unlike *some* others.
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 startedMessageT: Take your best headphones and try to listen for them. They're not normally seen, but that's by choice. Those who have seen them have not usually survived.
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 successMessaget: I'll get this data passed over to Maximus as soon as I can. I must warn you, he's heard that you have been working with Apollo..he isn't very happy.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de description: Maximus found out that you've been working with Apollo... seems the two of them have beef with each other. I'm not sure if you're going to be able to keep working for them both. Maximus wants you to go pick up an encrypted laptop their associate dropped off, it's near the lighthouse in one of the houses near the shore.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de startedMessageT: I don't know what's on this laptop, but he needs it.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de successMessaget: I'll let you know when I've got any information for you.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ec: Eliminate Raiders at the Laboratory from a distance of more than 35m
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 description: MAXIMUS: I appreciate you working with me. Apollo hates me for what I did to them when I decided to branch out and start my own crew. They were holding me back and I couldn't take it anymore. Don't believe whatever they tell you. Now that we're back to working together, I'm still investigating the strengths of the random guys around Tarkov. I figured we would go back to the source, it's possible they are also getting some type of immunity boost from the medical kits they carry on them. Take a bunch of them out and gather their medical packs for investigation. In the future I'll relay tasks through Scorpion instead of showing up here to talk to you personally.
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 startedMessageT: Head on out to the Laboratory and take out some juiced up raiders.
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 successMessaget: I'll start looking through these medical kits, maybe there's something in here worth something.
668858720221bbe5f306b5f5 description:
I have an order for a custom ADAR and I can't find the parts needed to get what they are looking for, maybe you can help out? 

Requirements:
  Ergonomics >= 63
  Sighting Range >= 500
  Recoil Sum <= 287
  Magazine Size >= 30
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 3.5 kg
668858720221bbe5f306b5f5 startedMessageT:
If you can take care of this, I get these types of requests often. 

Requirements:
 ADAR 2-15 5.56x45 carbine
  Ergonomics >= 63
  Sighting Range >= 500
  Recoil Sum <= 287
  Magazine Size >= 30
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 3.5 kg
668858720221bbe5f306b5f5 successMessaget: Thanks! I'm willing to bet I get another order soon.

New order arrived for a Desert Tech MDR chambered in 5.56x45mm. Get on it. 

Requirements:

668858720221bbe5f306b5fd startedMessageT:

  Recoil Sum <= 263
  Magazine Size >= 60

668858720221bbe5f306b5fd successMessaget: I'll get this to the client quickly!

  Rail Mount: MOD*X Branded

668858720221bbe5f306b607 successMessaget: Such a good looking sniper rifle, I'll be testing this out before handing it over
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b612 description:
Ooh, just got a call requesting a specialized SIG MCX .300 assault rifle, built for close quarters. I love this thing, too bad I need you to build you. I'd say you can take it for a spin but the guy wants it in pristine showroom condition. 

Requirements:
  Ergonomics >= 62
  Sighting Range >= 500
 Recoil Sum <= 312
  Magazine Size <= 20
  Durability == 100
  Weight <= 3.6 kg

  Silencer Required
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b612 startedMessageT:
I need to get a couple of these for myself, honestly.

 SIG MCX SPEAR 6.8x51 assault rifle
  Ergonomics >= 62
  Sighting Range >= 500
 Recoil Sum <= 312
  Magazine Size <= 20

  Weight <= 3.6 kg
  Barrel: 171mm

66885a3d0221bbe5f306b612 successMessaget: I'm sad to see this one go, but the client is paying good for it.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b61e description:
Looks like the last guy loved your handiwork on his last order that he now wants a SIG MCX Spear. 

Requirements:
  Ergonomics >= 50
  Sighting Range <= 800

66885a3d0221bbe5f306b61e startedMessageT:
I can't decide if the MCX Spear is better than the MCX .300 honestly. 

Requirements:
 SIG MCX SPEAR 6.8x51 assault rifle
  Ergonomics >= 50
  Sighting Range <= 800
  Recoil Sum <= 269
  Magazine Size >= 20

  Weight <= 4 kg
  Scope: Burris Fullfield TAC30
  Silencer Required
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b61e successMessaget: Thanks for being quick about it, I'll send it over to the client.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b628 description:
We've got a lover of close quarters combat requesting a custom shotgun. Specifically a Saiga 12K semi-automatic pellet destroyer, large shell capacity of course. They must be thinking of rolling through the factories. 

Requirements:
  Ergonomics >= 42
  Sighting Range >= 200
  Recoil Sum <= 595
  Magazine Size == 20
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 5 kg
  Magazine: SOK-12 Powermag 20-round magazine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b628 startedMessageT:
I'm curious what they plan on using this for. Not a lot of shotgun use around Tarkov. 

Requirements:
 Saiga-12K ver.10 12ga semi-automatic shotgun
  Ergonomics >= 42
  Sighting Range >= 200
  Recoil Sum <= 595
  Magazine Size == 20
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 5 kg
  Magazine: SOK-12 Powermag 20-round magazine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b628 successMessaget: The picked up the gear and immediately headed to the factories. I think they were more excited to test this than they were about their safety, they didn't even have plate protection. Fuckin' idiot. At least we got paid.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b631 description:
Ahh, a classic NATO firearm found in Tarkov..not as popular as it used to be, but still a solid firearm. Going to need a customized Colt M4A1 lead dispenser, they're requesting a lower weight to handle the firearm ergonomically while keeping the recoil as manageable as possible. 

Requirements:
  Ergonomics >= 62
  Sighting Range >= 400
  Recoil Sum <= 250
  Magazine Size: >= 20
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 3.75 kg
  Tactical Device Required
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b631 startedMessageT:
I might have to have you kit one of these for me, this looks like a laser. 

Requirements:
 Colt M4A1 5.56x45 assault rifle
  Ergonomics >= 62
  Sighting Range >= 400
  Recoil Sum <= 250
  Magazine Size: >= 20
  Durability >= 90
  Weight <= 3.75 kg
  Tactical Device Required
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b631 successMessaget: The client reached out and wanted to specifically thank you for the work on this request.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b63f: Locate the dead drop in the pumping station at night
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b640: Leave the PACA soft armours at the dead drop at night
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b644: Survive and extract from the location at night
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b63c description: I've got a group of guys stuck in the factory and are in desperate need of an armour drop off. I honestly don't care about these guys as much, they're new so give them the cheap shit. A couple PACAs ought to be good enough. You'll need to find the pumping station room and drop them off near the table. Remember, the armour needs to be in good condition. Don't get it all shredded first.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b63c startedMessageT: Keep an eye out for Tagilla, I heard he's been on a Rampage.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b63c successMessaget: Hopefully that helps those guys, we'll see. If they make it back anyway.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b653: Locate the dead drop at the pier
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b654: Leave the MF-UNTAR body armours at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b658: Survive and extract from the location
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b650 description: You've been contracted out to head to the shores, you need to delivery a couple MF-UNTAR armours to a dead drop at the pier. It should be two trash bins next to a pile of tires. I don't know why anyone wants these pieces of shit, they're bright ass blue. You can't blend into anything with these on!  Remember, the armour needs to be in good condition. Don't get it all shredded first.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b650 startedMessageT: Make your way down to the pier.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b650 successMessaget: My contact picked those armours up and he's happy about it, thanks.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b667: Locate the dead drop at the Mantis outlet store
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b668: Leave the BNTI Kirasa body armours at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b66c: Survive and extract from the location
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b664 description: Time to go to the mall - I need you to drop off some BNTI Kirasa armours in the Mantis outlet store. It's in the middle of the mall, the dead drop is next to a table and cot hidden in the corner right by the entrance.  Remember, the armour needs to be in good condition. Don't get it all shredded first.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b664 startedMessageT: Watch out for Killa, him and his brother have been raging lately. If you can manage to take him down and nab his armour, I'll need some later.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b664 successMessaget: Nice! Did you manage to also take out Killa?
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b67b: Locate the dead drop at the KIBA Arms International outlet
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b67c: Leave the NFM THOR Integrated Carrier body armour at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b67d: Leave the FORT Redut-T5 body armour at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b681: Survive and extract from the location
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b678 description: Back to the mall we go, this client likes this place for some reason. Maybe it's the lighting? It's not quite bright enough. It used to be so much better a couple years ago and someone fucked up the lights. You'll need to head into the KIBA Arms International outlet and drop the armour off near the broken crates. Remember, the armour needs to be in good condition. Don't get it all shredded first.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b678 successMessaget: Client is happy, I'm happy. Are you?
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b690: Locate the dead drop in the hanger gate
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b691: Leave the 6B43 Zabralo body armour at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b692: Leave the CQC Osprey MK4A plate carrier (Assault) at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b693: Leave the Crye Precision AVS plate carrier (Green) at the dead drop
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b697: Survive and extract from the location
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b68d description: Alright, this is a tough request we got in. It's probably best to bring a big ass backpack and get it all done at one time. It's not easy getting in and out of the Labs. You might have to wear one of the armours and shove the other two in your bag. Hide them in the car sitting in the hangar gate and dip out - you'll be exposed on your way out. Remember, the armour needs to be in good condition. Don't get it all shredded first.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b68d startedMessageT: Take your time, if you lose these - good fucking luck finding new ones.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b68d successMessaget: Thanks for dropping those off, the client checked in and got the gear.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6a7: Handover the found in raid 6B13 M assault armour (Killa Edition)
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6a6 description: This one is for me, remember how I said I needed some Killa Edition armour? Yeah I need two of them, in good condition. I've got a scout tandem going out and I need them to get their recon done and get back safely - this armour is the best balance for mobility and protection.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6a6 startedMessageT: Good condition only, I don't need my guys getting shot to shit because you couldn't find quality armour.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6a6 successMessaget: This'll do the job, I'll send out those scouts. Thanks.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6af: Handover the found in raid antique teapots
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b0: Handover the found in raid signature blend teas
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b1: Handover the found in raid antique books
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ae description: The Finer Things Club is the most exclusive club in Tarkov. Naturally, it's where you need to be. If you want to join, you'lll need to find a couple signature items. Once you've found them go ahead and hand them over and we'll grant you access.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ae startedMessageT: Couple teapots, boxes of tea, and a few book ought to do it.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ae successMessaget: Thanks for getting those, here's your tea and book for the next meeting.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b9: Handover the found in raid Antique vases
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ba: Handover the found in raid Bronze Lion figurines
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6bb: Handover the found in raid Cat figurines
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6bc: Handover the found in raid Horse figurines
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6bd: Handover the found in raid Raven figurines
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6be: Handover the found in raid Wooden clock
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b8 description: The Finer Things Club is all about fine things. Unfortunately, our decor has been a little lacking since we setup shop here. Go find us something nice antiqutes and figurines to place around to liven up the place. Only the finest here.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b8 startedMessageT: Only the highest quality items please. We don't need trash in this club.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6b8 successMessaget: Nice, I got all those setup, a few too many of the figurines but it's always nice to have a backup in case one of them breaks.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c6: Handover the found in raid Cultist figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c7: Handover the found in raid Scav figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c8: Handover the found in raid Mutkevich figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c9: Handover the found in raid Ded Moroz figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ca: Handover the found in raid BEAR figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6cb: Handover the found in raid USEC figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6cc: Handover the found in raid Ryzhy figurine
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c5 description: As you can see in my Hall Of Fame, I'm missing some amazing finds. Namely, all of the new figurines that have been released over the years. Go and find me each of the latest releases and hand them over for our trophy cabinet. Do try to make sure they aren't damaged in any way, no hand me downs allowed. Make it snappy!
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c5 startedMessageT: One of each ought to look good in the cabinet. Clean them before handing them over, thanks.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6c5 successMessaget: Oh those look very good. The club is really coming together, it's a nice area to sit and chat about books.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d2: Handover the found in raid Gold Skull rings
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d3: Handover the found in raid Golden Rooster figurines
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d4: Handover the found in raid Roler Gold watches
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d5: Handover the found in raid Golden Eggs
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d6: Handover the found in raid Golden 1GPhones
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d7: Handover the found in raid Golden Necklaces
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d1 description: I love gold! The look of it! The smell of it! The taste of it! The texture! We don't have near enough fancy gold items here in the club. Here's a list of what I need to complete the gold collection. It helps that they're worth a decent amount as well. Go out and find me what you can, rings, chains, watches, phones, anything gold really. Maybe even a nice egg in these trying times.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d1 startedMessageT: Breaker-breaker one-niner, this is Goldie Wang. Over.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6d1 successMessaget: This place really has come together quite well. If I think of anything else to spice it up, I'll let you know.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6e3: Find and handover the found in raid Golden 7.62x25 TT pistol
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6df description: One of my buddies came over and harassed me because apparently we're missing the coveted Golden TT Pistol. I really didn't think much about it..but later that night it got to bugging me and I couldn't sleep. I need you to find one for me in decent condition. You should be able to nick one off of Reshala. He doesn't always have it on him so you may need to hold him up a few times.
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6df startedMessageT: One Golden TT is all I need!
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6df successMessaget: Oooh pretty. It'll fit nicely in the collection. I'll have my buddy come over and rub it in his face!
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6ec: Eliminate any targets using a Golden 7.62x25 TT pistol
66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6e9 description: Now that I've been looking over the Golden TT Pistol..it doesn't really look like it would be an effective weapon. I want you to test it. Not mine though, this is a collectors item. Find your own. Go take out anyone, anywhere, while using it. Try to track the degradation and accuracy of it. I'm curious how it feels.

66885a3d0221bbe5f306b6e9 successMessaget: So it does work? But based on this data you brought back, it's a piece of shit. I guess it's a good thing it shouldn't see any action in my collection. Not really a 'defend yourself' piece of weaponry.
